name: ufi
description: UFI – Universelle, flexible Informationsanzeige – universal, flexible info display

scripts.push: git push -u origin master --force && git push -u github master --force
scripts.start:
echo "use systemd with 'ufi.service'-file to start this service in a production environment
for testing purposes, use 'npm run start:dev'"

author: Lennart Pelz <mail@mrpelz.de>
